ibank

Interface Bank


  • public interface Bank
    Bank is an account holder. Each client can only have one account. When a bank is first opened it has no accounts.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeAccount(Account account)
      Close an account and remove its balance from bank sheets.
      Account getAccountByHolderName(java.lang.String accountHolderName)
      Retrieve account by its owners name.

      Retrieve account by its number

      int getNumberOfAccounts() 
      java.math.BigDecimal getTotalReserves()

      Open a credit account.
      Account openDebitAccount(java.lang.String accountHolderName)
      Open a debit account.

    • Method Detail

      • getNumberOfAccounts

        int getNumberOfAccounts()
        Returns:
        number of open accounts

      • getTotalReserves

        java.math.BigDecimal getTotalReserves()
        Returns:
        sum of all bank account balances

      • getAllAccounts

        java.util.Collection<Account> getAllAccounts()
        Returns:
        all open accounts in a bank

      • openDebitAccount

        Account openDebitAccount(java.lang.String accountHolderName)
        Open a debit account. Debit account is a simple account to hold funds. There can be only one account per client.
        Parameters:
        accountHolderName - name of an account holder
        Returns:
        debit Account if creation succeeded, null otherwise

      • openCreditAccount

        Account openCreditAccount(java.lang.String accountHolderName,
                        java.math.BigDecimal creditLimit)
        Open a credit account. Credit account is an account which in addition to holding funds also allows taking out a credit. There can be only one account per client.
        Parameters:
        accountHolderName - name of an account holder
        creditLimit - maximum credit owner can withdraw
        Returns:
        credit Account with a set limit if creation succeeded, null otherwise

      • getAccountByHolderName

        Account getAccountByHolderName(java.lang.String accountHolderName)
        Retrieve account by its owners name.
        Parameters:
        accountHolderName - account owner name
        Returns:
        Account if exists

      • getAccountByNumber

        Account getAccountByNumber(java.lang.String accountNumber)
        Retrieve account by its number
        Parameters:
        accountNumber -
        Returns:
        Account if found

      • closeAccount

        void closeAccount(Account account)
        Close an account and remove its balance from bank sheets.
        Parameters:
        account -
